game

Class Game2Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game2Controller

  • public class Game2Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    HD GAME CONTROLLER

    Controller class for HD grid, including current state, previous states, etc.
    Since:
    November 2017

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game2Controller

        public Game2Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes the FXML. Hides the UNDO button, adds important parameters to the current gamestate, creates and initialises new grids for current and previous states, and adds pane for each cell to the main root pane. Also starts the count and gives initial colors to the grid.

      • restart

        protected void restart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Event Handler for the button that restarts the game by clearing the grid and creating a new instance of the FXML.
        Parameters:
        event - Click Triggered Event
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any Exception

      • save

        protected void save(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Event Handler for the Save button. Adds necessary properties to the SaveGame static class properties and uses the serialize in Main to save the state.
        Parameters:
        event - Click Triggered Event
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any Exception

      • goHome

        protected void goHome(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Event Handler for the Exit Button to take the user to the Home Screen.
        Parameters:
        event - Click Triggered Event
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any Exception

      • clk

        protected void clk(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Event Handler for the Game. The grid is comprised of buttons arranged in a grid format. For every button pressed the coordinated are checked and the appropriate trigger cell is decided. While saving the previous grid state, the grid is altered and the number of orbs is increased. The appropriate color is set for the cell and the grid is checked for explosions. Then the grid color is changed for the next player.
        Parameters:
        event - Click Triggered Event
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any Exception

      • undo

        protected void undo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Event handler for the UNDO button. Previous grid is set as the current grid and the UNDO button is hidden to prevent misuse.
        Parameters:
        event - Click Triggered Event
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any Exception
